content:
Stanley Eze is a recent Masters graduate of computer from the University of Regina. I also have my Bachelors in computer which I obtained from Nnamdi Azikiwe University Awka.
During my course of study, I worked extensively in various aspects of general computer programming and software development. Understanding current trends like UX/UI, artificial intelligent, data processing, designs with empathy, software document, etc, I took courses that are relevant to each of these aspects of computing.
Relevant Courses; Software Development Principles, Humman Computer Communication, Data Analysis From the Internate, Artificial Intelligence, Information Visualization

content: Fish farm water quality monitoring using the internet of things. This projects was build with Arduino micro-controller and nodeMCU wifi module.
summary: Fish farm water quality monitoring using the internet of things. This projects was build with Arduino micro-controller and nodeMCU wifi module.
title: Iot Fish Farm Monitoring

content: Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock Game is an extended version of the classical Rock Paper Scissors game mentioned in the Season 2 of “Big Bang Theory” by Sheldon Cooper.
summary: Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock Game is an extended version of the classical Rock Paper Scissors game mentioned in the Season 2 of “Big Bang Theory” by Sheldon Cooper.
title: Rock Scissors Paper (Java)

content: Analyzing the individual performances of the musical duo Psquare using their separate Youtube channels based on the total views on all their videos. Psquare is an African music group that is made up of Peter(Peter's channel is MrPVEVO) and Paul (Paul's Channel is RudeboyVEVO).
summary: Analyzing the individual performances of the musical duo Psquare using their separate Youtube channels based on the total views on all their videos. Psquare is an African music group that is made up of Peter(Peter's channel is MrPVEVO) and Paul (Paul's Channel is RudeboyVEVO).
title: Basic Calculator
